fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Force feed a player a mystery pancake.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the night, the host tells you what effect your pancake will have on the person you force feed it to.
- No two pancakes can have the same effect.
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Mafia.
